Description:
Timeless Family Home with a High-End Build
Exceeding expectations with a design and build of sensational quality. This Paul Crawford three-bedroom, two-bathroom, two-living family home still presents as new.
Behind the inviting and immaculate front façade is the first spacious living area. Also at the front of the home is the large master bedroom featuring an ensuite and a good-sized walk-in robe.
Down the hall, you'll discover the gorgeously open and bright kitchen, living/dining area. Entertainers and families that like to cook will love this chef's kitchen featuring the stainless-steel wall oven, microwave cavity, gas stainless steel cooktop, roller-door toaster/bread cavity, dishwasher, pantry and loads of bench space for your convenience.
The remaining two bedrooms have built-in robes and both share a family-sized bathroom. The entire home has new carpets, a fresh paint job to some of the home and a 6.6KW solar system. All zones are kept warm in the winter with ducted heating throughout as well as nice and cool in the summer with an evaporative cooling system throughout.
Step outside to the stunningly maintained backyard featuring a massive undercover alfresco area with added fans installed just in time for summer. There's a lovely decked area plus plenty of grassed areas for the kids to run around on. Around the side, you'll find a small garden shed for storage. The double lock-up garage at the front of the home also offers a roller door onto the alfresco and into the back yard.
This fabulous home is situated just down the road from Aldi, Chemist Warehouse and an IGA. You're also a short 5-minute drive to Lansell Square and Bunnings as well just 10 mins into the heart of Bendigo's CBD.
Make sure you inspect this beauty on Saturday or get in early and book a private inspection with Matt.
Insights: 117 Lockwood Road, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
A CHARMING SLICE OF BENDIGOS HISTORY
This unique and beautifully presented home is an absolutely charming piece of Bendigos gold mining heritage. Built in 1857 by Englishman, John Cappy, the home offers a blend of Colonial picturesque architecture and Gothic-influenced detailing. Described, in an 1872 edition of the Bendigo Advertiser as an English gentlemans home the property retains many of the original details that made it so.
Positioned high at the top of a quiet court, the cottage garden leads up to the pretty, historical façade. A wide verandah flanks the front of the home, and the main entry is spacious, light-filled and packed full of stunning original features. The master bedroom, off the main entry, is generously proportioned with fantastic built-in storage; a large bay window with oversized sash windows and an ensuite with bath neatly hidden away. A second bedroom behind the master, also offers fantastic proportions, including built-in robes, and a third bedroom can be found on the other side of the home.
Also off the main entry is the first of two large living areas. This beautiful room includes timber-lined ceilings and original marble fireplace. Next door, a second living room also offers space for formal dining and features a large bay window. Behind this room is the country style kitchen and diner with ample storage and period detailing such as pressed metal splashback. Pressed metal lining on the cabinetry offers further character and charm to the space.
A hallway running along the rear of the property leads off to a study with built-in shelving, and the floorplan is completed with a bathroom and a good-sized laundry. Skylights in the hallway and main bathroom allow plenty of natural light into the space.
Doors from the house open out to a large paved brick alfresco area. An established garden surrounds a lawn area, and a separate lawn and garden offers a lush backdrop to the fully fenced inground pool. A driveway at the side of the house leads around to a double carport and provides additional off-street parking. Further garden space to the side of the home, and a workshop ensures there is plenty of room to keep any green thumb happy.
Additional features include:
Ducted heating throughout
Gas heating and wood fireplace in living areas
Ceiling fans throughout
Original heritage features throughout including high ceilings, large rooms, decorative cornice and ceiling roses, timber flooring, dado boards and marble fireplaces
Kitchen appliances including dishwasher and stove with separate grill and six-burner gas cooktop
Fully fenced inground swimming pool
Water tank (22,000l)
Outbuildings including garden shed and workshop
Cellar
Sitting in an elevated position at the end of a quiet court, this delightful home offers a beautiful blend of historic charm and modern living. Located within walking distance to schools, shops, bus stops and train station, the home is positioned on the Melbourne side of the city and is just 10 minutes to the centre of Bendigo. With space and character inside and out, this is a very special property that offers both a slice of Bendigos rich history and a wonderful family home.

Description:
SECURE AND PACKED FULL OF FEATURES
This feature-packed minimal maintenance home has plenty of extras inside and out for someone wanting comfort, convenience and security!!
39b Alder Street is an easy-care three-bedroom home, it has built in robes to all bedrooms; there is the original bathroom with bath, shower and basin; laundry and a separate toilet. It also boasts a carpeted lounge (with gas heater) and an open-plan kitchen-meals space. The kitchen is original, but in good order with ceramic hot plates, electric wall oven and grill plus amply cabinetry. The meals space has a sliding door leading to the covered alfresco, there is a wall air conditioner and ceiling fan too. The home features ducted refrigerative heating and cooling throughout; electric external window shutters and internal vertical blinds with pelmets, secure front fence with automatic gate and an automatic garage door. There is vehicle access past the garage door to a covered carport which is an extension of the alfresco space out back. All of this on a 457m2 allotment.
The secure back yard is immaculate with synthetic turf rolled out to the entire yard, high Colorbond fences and a garden shed and a 4.8m x 3.6m workshop or studio which is fully plaster lined and immaculate inside and out.
Positioned very close to public transport, schools, shops and conveniences are all close-by. Neat, tidy and packed with plenty of extras - it is really worth a look!!

Description:
Exactly what you have been searching for
Located in a quiet court, this well planned and beautifully presented home will suit all buyers who inspect it.
Whether you are looking for a large backyard for children to play or sufficient off-street parking for the caravan or motor home, this 800 sq metre allotment will tick all those boxes.
Conveniently located to schools, shops, public transport and the indoor swimming centre, location is another benefit to your purchase of this home.
Inside Features Include:
9 Foot ceilings throughout
Large main bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite

Large kitchen with two drawer Fisher & Paykel dishwasher

Zoned slab heating
Well insulated
Split system air conditioning and ceiling fans
Bathroom with an abundance of natural light and corner spa
Excellent storage throughout
Outside Features include:
Single garage with auto door
Brick storage shed attached to the garage
3 kw solar panels
Large timber decked entertaining area
Large rainwater tank storage under deck connected to toilet
Sufficient room for a shed or workshop if required
An inspection is a must otherwise this will be one of those if only homes.
Presentation, planning and location are essential to any purchase and this home meets all these requirements.

Description:
Spacious Living in Kangaroo Flat
Beautifully presented brick four-bedroom family home with attached double garage.
The property boasts fully irrigated grounds with a carefully landscaped front aspect.
3kW solar panels and evaporative cooling throughout the home for the blend of comfort, environment and economic efficiency.
Enjoy the sunrises and sunsets or not, with electric shutters on the east and west aspects.
Updated galley kitchen connects two large, open living areas and a dedicated dining area.
Spacious master suite decked out with walk-in robe and modern ensuite.
Remaining three bedrooms boast built-in wardrobes.
Ducted heating and cooling throughout.
The more-than-handy 6m x 7.6m backyard shed (with power and mechanic's pit!) gives you all the storage to ensure the cars can fit in the attached double garage, plus storage room under the house - ideal for a teenager's retreat.
Outdoor entertaining is a breeze year-round with a living room opening onto a covered pergola.
Close to local shops and schools and surrounded by beautiful walking tracks.

Description:
The Complete Package - 3 Bedroom Home in Kangaroo Flat
This beautiful modern home, built by local builder Brent Friswell, is located in a quiet street in popular Kangaroo Flat, handy to Centro Lansell and Big Hill Primary School.
Ideal for first home buyers, families or retirees, the home is a 'must see', set on a 724m2 lot and boasting plenty of features which are sure to impress.
Comprising 3 large bedrooms, the master has a walk in robe and ensuite, while the others have built-in robes.
The quality kitchen has a 900mm oven with gas cooktop, dishwasher and feature tiling.
The two living areas include a family room adjoining the kitchen and dining.
Polished concrete floors and north facing living add to the impressive list of styling and qualities found throughout the home.
Feature wall panelling, video doorbell security, ducted gas heating, ducted refrigerated cooling and a massive 5KW solar system, are just some of the great features this home has to offer.
Outside, you will find an alfresco area, and for vehicles there's side access to the large 7m x 10m shed, complete with power and a custom made workbench.
The great sized, level backyard is ideal for kids to play.
This property is a must see!
Internal area
19m²

Description:
Neat and Tidy Makeover at Morrison
Located within walking distance of Kangaroo Flat CBD and Centro Lansell with public transport at your doorstep, this well renovated property has so much to offer.
Features include:
Two spacious bedrooms, each with a split system heating/cooling unit
Polished timber floors throughout
Renovated kitchen with stone bench tops, dishwasher, updated gas cook top with electric oven and quality tapware
Impressive modern bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, shower, vanity and toilet
Ducted gas heating throughout
Laundry with entry out to the back patio area, fully covered with concrete floor, plus a second toilet outside
Securely fenced large yard, with an original 6m x 5m (approx.) iron shed with concrete floor and double carport attached
The property has also been fully re-stumped with concrete stumps, there's resealed ridge capping on the tiled roof and the home has been fully painted internally and externally. So much more to discover, be very quick to book your private inspection at this one!

Description:
Immaculate Family Home with a Huge Backyard
Set in a great area of Kangaroo Flat, in a private, established street, so close to the CBD is this lovely, beautifully maintained 4-bedroom 2-bathroom home. This well-kept home is situated on a large allotment and under 5km to the centre of Bendigo plus Lansell Square Shopping Mall a short 5-minute drive away.
Featuring four bedrooms, the main with a good-sized ensuite and all have massive built-in wardrobes.
The kitchen and dining area is an open plan space and directly connects to the huge 7.3metre long lounge room which is kept toasty warm in winter and cool in summer by the 2 split system units.
The kitchen is a fantastic feature of the home, boasting high-quality stainless steel Westinghouse oven/grill, an electric stove, dishwasher, loads of cupboards and bench space with terrific outdoor views.
The second bathroom has undergone some updates and features a modern all-glass walk-in shower, single vanity, with a separate WC.
The huge laundry comes with added linen cupboards and will be a great spot for storage and keeping things nice and organised. It also has access straight outside to the clothesline.
This wonderful home also comes with 4.5KW solar which will help to lower your electricity bills. Plus solar hot water with a gas booster. Three water tanks with pumps and a fully landscaped backyard. You've also got a fantastic shed/workshop out the back for the tradies in the family.
At the front of the home is a 2 car carport under the roofline which would also fit another 1-2 vehicle's off-street parking.
This incredible home is set in a quiet family friendly street, a short drive to the local primary schools, supermarkets, train/bus stations and just an hour and a half to Melbourne.
If you are looking for a quality family home with all the creature comforts then an inspection is a must.
Insights: 15 Wireless Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Unique Home in Quiet Court Location
Ten years young yet an absolute charmer, this architecturally-designed abode totally owns authentic uniqueness. From stone exterior quarried locally in Castlemaine to split-level floorplan culminating in spectacular city-scape vistas, it's flush with natural light, character features and comforts.
Set amongst deliriously healthy date palms in stunning landscaped grounds, it seems like this superbly finished property was established 150 years ago! French doors grant easy access to a broad verandah, covered alfresco and private courtyard for their full appreciation.
Vast enough for several sofas, the living zone looks none-the-less incredibly cosy. You'll be wishing for cool weather this year, just so the family can cuddle up around the gas log fire! But a split system, ducted gas heating and ceiling fans have all bases covered anyway. Genuine hardwood floors and LED lighting are more outstanding inclusions, as well as modern appliances in a perfectly appointed and utterly gorgeous kitchen.
Upon the entry level, 2 large bedrooms share a bathroom and separate toilet. Upstairs, the retreat or 3rd bedroom has an ensuite and desk, along with 3 dormer windows to admire the sensational views.
Nearby, Cooinda Park provides a pleasant place for family fun, plus there's a gym just a warm-up jog away. Ride to school and college in 5 minutes, drive into the city centre in 10 or bus in about 25. Closer still is a train station plus shopping precinct possessing all you need and a major complex a little further up the road, en route to Melbourne.
Put simply...WOW!
Insights: 3A Keast Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
More like a house than a unit.
This is no ordinary unit, it's more like the first home you have before you're ready for a first home or the downsizer before you're ready for a downsizer.
Sited at the rear of an elevated block, it offers more garden area than normal along with added levels of privacy and security.
Bigger and brighter internally than most units, it has been lavished with love and attention by the current owners who have totally refreshed and upgraded it with bathroom fittings, floor coverings, drapes, paintwork, wardrobe and security doors.
It has two good-sized bedrooms, both with mirrored-fronted robes, convenient two-way bathroom beside the oversized main bedroom, spacious lounge with study nook overlooking the front garden, u-shaped kitchen with gas cooking and ample cabinetry adjoining a roomy dining area and laundry
with external access.
Split air conditioning system in the lounge and gas heating in the dining area ensures no-one is left out in the cold.
Low-maintenance rear yard, accessed through the double carport or sliding doors from the dining area, is a low-maintenance, paved courtyard-style with a vine-draped backdrop behind bluestone retaining walls with plenty of room for entertaining family and friends on lazy summer evenings while a brick storage room at the end of the carport secures garden tools, bikes etc.
Ideally located close to public transport, it's a great stepping-stone home and as good as the day it was built.

Description:
First home-buyer, investor or tradie
Beautifully positioned opposite a peaceful reserve, this fully renovated home on an approx 860m2 block is ready to move into.
It's obvious from the moment you step inside this sturdy brick 3 bedroom home that this home was built to last.
Light and airy the interior has been updated with fresh paint, new carpets throughout plus an updated kitchen and bathroom.
Comprising 3 bedrooms, two with built-in robes, and a central bathroom.
The front of the home is north facing and looking out to a tranquil bush setting, and allowing privacy and winter sun into your home. Ducted gas heating and split system heating and cooling provide year round comfort.
The kitchen and dining is open plan and overlooks the back yard and patio, making this perfect for keeping an eye on young children.
Other features include, 6m x 9m shed with concrete floor and power, veggie patch and fruit trees.
Only minutes to all Kangaroo Flat amenities.
Simply move in and enjoy.

Description:
Huge Six Bedder - calling the Brady Bunch!
This large family home boasts 6 roomy bedrooms (all of which have walk-in robes), and has a large bungalow which gives you the option for a 7th bedroom, large private gym, guest retreat, workshop or home business (STCA). A neatly finished red brick veneer with double garage, this property opens into a comfortable space which will perfectly suit large or growing families, giving you room to move and grow!
The oversized master bedroom lets plenty of light in during the day with two large windows, and includes a tidy three-piece ensuite and large walk-in-robe.
Your family will be well-accommodated in the practical and central kitchen and meals area, which includes a 900mm oven and cooktop, a dishwasher, and a large walk-in pantry. The main bathroom is conveniently located towards the middle of the home and includes a deep bath and large shower, along with two basins and a separate toilet. The laundry offers plenty of storage space.
A large second living area towards the rear of the home, which also opens onto the backyard, is ideal for use as a lounge room or rumpus room. Ceiling fans along with ducted heating and cooling mean that your family can feel comfortable no matter which part of the house they are in.
Outdoors, the property is completed by a large undercover entertaining area, garden shed, landscaped garden and a large brick dog kennel (so that every member of your family has a place to call home!). A fully-enclosed backyard provides you with privacy and security, along with a great space for children to play. The garage has through-access which provides the perfect place to store your boat or trailer. The family-friendly street is close to state forest, walking tracks, a lake and public transport.
This property is currently leased to a great tenant for $460pw.

Description:
You've got this!
Getting into your first home or investment is easy when the property is priced right and this new listing offers better value than most in the price range.
The well-located home with neat front garden offers side porch entry to the gas-heated lounge, three bedrooms, central bathroom and updated kitchen featuring stainless steel gas/electric cooking appliances, dishwasher and plenty of storage in gloss white cabinetry including corner pantry.
A large family room equipped with gas wall furnace and wall-mounted air conditioner opens off the kitchen with a renovated laundry and WC alongside.
Outside, there's a covered area at the rear for outdoor living while the large, secure backyard includes various garden sheds, rainwater tanks and single carport.
Located on approx. 695m² allotment, this property is close to Bunnings, Centro Lansell Shopping Centre, Rocklea Home Centre, Kangaroo Flat shopping strip and public transport.
Call for an inspection today.
